Description:
Stack creating a VPC and launch EC2 instances within it.
    **WARNING** This template creates Amazon EC2 instances.
    You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create
    a stack from this template. **WARNING** This template creates
    role for the launching/deleting instances/subnets/interfaces.
    This role will invoke AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole, please see
    AWS Documentation for details on AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole.

ClientAgentControlCIDR.default: Control Subnet for CyPerf Client Agent at VPC1

ServerAgentControlCIDR.default: Control Subnet for CyPerf Client Agent at VPC2

ClientAgentTestCIDR.default: Test Subnet for CyPerf Client Agent at VPC1

ServerAgentTestCIDR.default: Test Subnet for CyPerf Server Agent at VPC2

CyPerfUIINstanceDNS.Description: DNS name of CyPerf Application instance

CyPerfMessageBrokerINstanceDNS.Description: DNS name of CyPerf Message Broker instance

AvailabilityZone.Default: <Select preffered availability zone from drop down>

KeyNameForCyPerfAgent.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair
KeyNameForCyPerfAgent.Description: Existing KeyPair to login to the CyPerf instances

ClientAgentControlCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ClientAgentControlCIDR.Description: CyPerf Client Agent will use this subnet for control plane communication with controller at VPC1

ServerAgentControlCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ServerAgentControlCIDR.Description: CyPerf Server Agent will use this subnet for control plane communication with controller at VPC2

ControllerNetworkCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ControllerNetworkCIDR.Description: This subnet is attached to CyPerf controller and would be used to access the CyPerf controllers' UI

AllowedSubnet.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
AllowedSubnet.Description: Subnet range allowed to access deployed AWS resources

ClientAgentTestCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ClientAgentTestCIDR.Description: CyPerf Client Agent will use this subnet for test traffic at VPC1

ServerAgentTestCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ServerAgentTestCIDR.Description: CyPerf Server Agent will use this subnet for test traffic at VPC2

Username.Description: Enter Team or Individual email id  Responsible for the Stack.

VPC1CIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

VPC2CIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
